column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday February 7 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for New Circle Rd:
column4: The outer loop is shutdown at Harrodsburg Rd due to a collision just prior to Nicholasville Rd.  Traffic diverted to Harrodsburg Rd.

column3: Traffic Alert for New Circle Rd:
column4: Additional collision reported on the inner loop side.  At least one lane is blocked.
